semantic_identifier: [GOLD-3]: Add end-to-end regression tests for fit_estimation CSV import → scoring to catch type/mapping and validation issues
title: Add end-to-end regression tests for fit_estimation CSV import → scoring to catch type/mapping and validation issues

sections.text: Create an automated test suite that exercises the full fit_estimation pipeline (CSV import normalization → scoring request → fit score + driver breakdown response) using representative CSV fixtures with common edge cases (enums, blanks, NaN, out-of-range). Assert that normalized values are what the scoring service receives, and that invalid fields produce structured per-field errors rather than silently affecting scores. These tests should prevent regressions across the fixes in GOLD-1 and the input validation changes in GOLD-2.
